title: Wrath

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose a player to Threaten. The next night, they are informed they must choose a player to basic attack, or they can choose to be attacked by you instead.
- At night, choose a player to Guard. You protect them, killing any player who attempts to attack them and taking the hit for them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If a player you Threaten does not carry out a kill (ie: they are roleblocked), you attack them anyway.
- If a player you Threaten attempts to attack a Peasant, you kill them instead and they make no attack.
- If a player you Threaten attempts to attack an evil player (ie: town attacks a Mafia), they do not attack them: instead they are informed their target was evil. This also applies to Framed players.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Kill 4 people. (You must be the one killing them. The victims of Threatened players do not count.)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.
